titleStmt.title: SII 5.287: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 287. (A.R. No. 611 of 1893). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śrīkoccaṭaipaṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvirapā
ṇṭiyatevaṟku yāṇṭu Irupattiraṇṭāvatu Āṉi
vaikāvināṭṭu Āykkuṭiyil cunatarapāṇṭiyanallūrk
kāraṇavarom nāyaṉār paṇṭārattārkku viṭutiṭṭuk kuṭut
taparicāvatu Eṅkaḷ kāṇiyāṉa ṉaṉṉilam nāṉūṟṟorupatto
rumā vitil nāṅkaḷ muṉṉāḷ tevatāṉamāka viṭṭa kārmaṟu ni
lam Orumā mukkāṇiyum Orupattaṟainilam nālumāvum Ā
ka ṉilam Añcumā mukkāṇiyum nikki nilam nāṉūṟṟaiñcumāk kā
ṇiyum Ituk kaṭaippāṉa cuntarapāṇṭiyanallūruṅ kāṭukaḷum
puṉceykaḷum kuṭiiruppukkaḷum toṭṭaṅkaḷum kuḷaṅkaḷil Ū
ravarkaḷum meṉokkiṉa maramum kiṇokkiṉa kiṇaṟukkum maṟṟum E
pperppaṭṭa samastaprāptikaḷum Iṟṟaināḷāl Eṅkaḷ
maiyāle viṭṭu viṭutiṭṭuk kuṭuttom nāyaṉār paṇṭ
ārattārkku Ikkāraṇavarom Ippaṭikku kāraṇavar Amai
ñcamaikku ṛṣabhatevar makaṉ tirunaṭṭapperumāḷ Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai kumiṉātevar Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai muṭi
koṇṭappallavaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku kaṇṭarātittappa
llavaraiyaṉ taṟkuṟi māṭṭeṟinteṉ ṛṣabhade vaṉ Eḻuttu Ola
kkac coḻanāṭāḻvāṉ taṟkuṟi māṭṭeṟinteṉ muṭikoṇṭa
coḻapaṭṭaṉeṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai cemaṉ Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku tillai ciṅkadevar taṟkuṟitaṟkuṟi māṭṭeṟinteṉ
āṉārarāyaṇatevar Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku piḷḷai nāṭāḻvāṉ Eḻu
ttu Ippaṭikku pallavarāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivarkaḷ co
lla Ivviṭutiṭṭu Eḻutiṉamaikku Ivvūr māheśca rarāl Aṟu
mukappiccaṉ Eḻuttu
Digital edition of SII 5.287 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
